# A bit more about me
I was born in Belgium in may 2001 from Italian parents. I then moved to Switzerland and later on to China. I then completed my bachelor's at Bocconi University in Milan. I am now living in London. To summarize, my education went a bit like this:

1. Kindergarten in French in Belgium
2. Primary school in Italian in Belgium
3. Middle school in both English and French in Switzerland
4. High school in English in China
5. Bachelor's in English in Italy
6. Master's in English in the UK

Studies aside I enjoy playing tennis and the lesser known [padel.](https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Padel_(sport))
